entities.name: fang
entities.description: The fang is described as being on the floor next to Harry and is used to plunge into the heart of the book.

entities.name: book
entities.description: The book is described as having its heart pierced by the fang.

entities.name: diary
entities.description: The diary is described as spewing out ink in torrents when the Basilisk venom hits it.

entities.name: Riddle
entities.description: Riddle is described as writhing and twisting, screaming and flailing before disappearing.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is described as pulling himself up after the ordeal, gathering his wand and the Sorting Hat, and retrieving the glittering sword from the Basilisk's mouth.

entities.name: Basilisk
entities.description: The Basilisk is described as being dead on the floor, with its venom burning a hole through the diary.

entities.name: Ginny
entities.description: Ginny is described as stirring and sitting up after the ordeal, with her bemused eyes travelling from the dead Basilisk to Harry.

relationships.description: The fang plunged by Harry pierced the heart of the book.
The Basilisk venom burned a hole through the diary.
Harry gathered together his wand and the Sorting Hat after the ordeal.
Harry retrieved the glittering sword from the Basilisk's mouth.
